body.name: voenxe Women Bikini Underwear,Seamless Breathable Ladies Panties,No Show Comfortable Briefs Undies for Women,Hipster,5-Pack
features: (Seller's Reminder) Per Amazon's policy, try-on of underwear items must be carried out without contact with the body(and with your clothes on) to qualify for return or reimbursement, which is recommended upon the receipt of this pack of underwear for timely determination of the appropriateness of size.

(Built Where It Counts) Considerable deliberation is given to the materials of these bikini thongs, which starts with nylon and Spandex for the whole body to increase its elasticity, resistance to shrinkage and overall robustness while a layer of pure cotton is added to the crotch to minimize the likelihood of venereal discomfort as well as maximize the comfy feel in the most sensitive parts of female bodies and give enough support for placing necessary hygienic product.

(Go commando Anywhere Anytime) Feel like going commando but worried others might see your secrets? With these Bikini panties, you can do it worry-free. Coming with a mesh structure that's highly breathable, lightweight and can easily wick away moisture, wearing them is almost like wearing nothing. Plus, the virtuous craftsmanship from our designers makes sure the thongs do not ride up or fall down or dig into your sacred ravines in the front and back.

(Your Secret Guarded, Seamlessly and Invisibly) Worried about pantie lines insinuating your secret, misleading people's attention and stealing the thunder of a carefully-chosen outfit whenever you are out and about? With these panties, that concern ceases to exist. Drawing upon years of R&D, we have successfully made that annoying pantie line invisible and by that, these panties your no-brainer go-to choice, whatever outfit you might want to sport.

(See Yourself in Your Choice) Your choice of underwear reveals your inner self. Whether you are a business leader who needs leopard skin to increase your inner power, or a highly disciplined scout girl who sticks to the basic shades every day or an innocent gal whose fondness for flowers no other patterns can win over, whatever your color preference is, we have that exact color for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Founded on the belief that comfortable and stylish underwear should be a right and not a privilege, Voenxe was created with a mission to empower people with high-quality, affordable underwear made for every body type. We know that feeling good in your own skin is not just about what you wear on the outside, but what you wear underneath too. That's why we're committed to creating underwear that not only promotes your body positivity but also improves your general well-being.

What's in the Package: Seamless Bikini Underwear * 5 Seller's Reminder Wash is recommended before first use (as is with all clothing), which should be done by hand instead of machine to avoid deformation and should be preceded by a trial-run to determine whether there's a size misfit, in which case simply return for the right size.

Perfect Gift Choice Wondering what to get your girl for her big days and the holiday season? A pair of comfy, breathable, seamless bikini panties from us that reflects her inner self and she can sport on any occasion could just be the perfect idea. And a pair of undies to her liking might also be the key to kindle the fire in the bedroom. Convenient Assortment and Packaging. With five assorted undies in each pack and multiple patterns and colors to choose from, a packet of these bikini underwear can easily get you through the week whether you are commuting between work and home or out hiking or on a short sightseeing trip. Coming in a package that's barely bigger than your palm, you can easily slip them into any of your bags and travel light. Upgrade Your Wardrobe Combined with first-class material and precise cut, these bikini panties are designed to accentuate your curves while providing full coverage where you need it. Whether you're looking for a classic color or a shade a litter more daring and adventurous, this bikini underwear collection has something for every occasion and is the new must-have undies in your wardrobe.

VOENXE Seamless Thong Underwear VOENXE Lace Seamless Thong Underwear VOENXE Seamless Hipster Underwear voenxe High Waisted Seamless Women Underwear Thongs VOENXE Seamless Hipster Underwear Fabric 90% Polyamide, 10% Elastane 62% Cotton, 38% Modal 90% Polyamide, 10% Elastane 92% Nylon, 8% Spandex 90% Polyamide, 10% Elastane Style Low Rise Low Rise Low Rise High Rise Low Rise Tagless ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Size Range XS-XXL XS-XXL XS-XXL XS-XXL XS-XXL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loooove these.
reviews.reviewText: Now why would I post a photo? Haha. Seriously though; I love these, and I seldom get excited about panties because it’s so hard to find ones you love. I’m super picky about underwear. These are light; you forget you have any on. The fit is nice. And… drumroll… no panty lines! I’m super picky about panty lines. These are brilliant! No. Freaking. Panty. Lines! Cute patterns, airy fabric, good fit, and NO PANTY LINES! I think I’ll order several more packs in case this company stops making them or ceases business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft stretchy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: These underwear extremely cute. I wear a size 6 and ordered medium and they fit perfect. Snug enough to stay on perfectly, but they don't cut in or show panty lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fabric is soft, breathable and wicking. Seams are heat sealed so I hope they hold up. Flower pattern is cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice material, but
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’3”, 180lbs and normally wear size L. I wanted to buy floral print underwear because I get tired of plain solids all the time. So, I purchased the 5 pack of floral in size L.PROs: very soft and lightweight material, no VPL, floral patterns very pretty, great price for what you getCONs: wish openings had a little more elastic feel to them; underwear has an occasional “gaping” feel around leg openings on the backside when bending at the hip (knee raises and simply walking forward) and verified in front of mirror (if that makes sense).Overall, this is a good product and I would have rated at 3.5 stars mainly due to elastic issue. Perhaps sizing down might fix the gaping issue for me 🤷🏻‍♀️. I would consider purchasing again.

reviews.reviewerName: Love these breathable and comfy bikini underwear!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, soft and breathable!!
reviews.reviewText: Love love love! These bikini underwear are lightweight, soft, breathable, comfy and fit great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I want to love them
reviews.reviewText: I like the designs. I love the way they feel when I first put them on. After a short while though, they start falling down. I have tried washing them in warm water and drying, multiple times. They are just too stretchy. If the waistband elastic was stronger, it might help. They are so soft and smooth, I really wish they worked. They don't seem too big when they first go on. They seem perfect. But, you might want to try a size down from your normal size to try to get better results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So cute and great fabric. Great fit for my xl bum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the absolute best undies ever! Soft, breathable and lightweight.

I bought these specifically to wear under yoga pants at the gym, and so far they’re great. Comfortable and breathable. I normally wear a small so that’s what I bought. When I tried the first pair on under yoga pants, I was disappointed because they seemed a bit tight and a slight panty line was visible for that reason. I almost returned them to size up, but decided to wear a pair for the day to see if I liked them enough to buy them in a bigger size. I’m glad I did, because the fit relaxed a bit during the first wear and now they’re a perfect fit, with no visible panty line. I haven’t washed them or worn any of the pairs more than once so I can’t comment on whether there is a potential for them to relax too much to where they bunch or lose their shape, but I’ll update this comment if that is the case. So far so good, I just ordered another pack in nude!!
These are great and the sizing is accurate (L fitted my hips at 41") and it is stretchy. I like the neutral colours offered in the 5-pack and may buy more!
Great cut and fabric. Good coverage.
Están súper bonitos!! Y la tela me gustó mucho, lo único que les recomiendo es pedir una talla menos, vienen un poco amplios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these knickers. The material is soft and they are just so comfortable I’ve decided to order another pack. I’m a size 8 and the small size fit perfectly. They are presented in a lovely box that can be recycled.
